short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Books you are currently reading - stay motivated and on track everytime you open a new page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay motivated and on track with your reading - see what you are reading, and what inspiring books you have lined up every time you open a new window in your browser.

This Chrome Extension retrieves your reading status from Literal (https://literal.club), using Literal's official API. If you don't have a Literal account, sign up (it is free).

Supports light/dark mode and subtle and smooth animations. It does not require sharing any password or credentials, no tracking data or any other data is shared.
